meanings.definition: A person who compiles a detailed list of recordings by a particular artist or group.
meanings.sent1: The discographer meticulously organized all the albums by the band.
meanings.sent2: The discographer's collection of the artist's music was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The discographer accidentally mixed up all the songs and created a funny playlist.
meanings.sent4: She was a discographer of memories, cataloging each song like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The discographer's room was filled with shelves of neatly arranged CDs and vinyl records.

meanings.definition: The act of compiling a detailed list of recordings by a particular artist or group.
meanings.sent1: Her discographer of the band's music was thorough and well-organized.
meanings.sent2: The discographer of the artist's discography was a time-consuming task.
meanings.sent3: During the party, the discographer of the playlist accidentally hit shuffle.
meanings.sent4: The discographer of sounds, she captured every note like a painter with colors.
meanings.sent5: His discographer of musical history was like a map leading to hidden treasures.
